subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn skied through pain in her left knee to win another super-G, claiming her sixth victory of the season by a small margin over her German rival Maria Riesch.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn skied through pain in her left knee to win another super-G, claiming her sixth victory of the season by a small margin over her German rival Maria Riesch.
